news.content:
ðŸ˜® Wow!ðŸ˜®

This morning our team woke up to 400+ emails to register for our Titan V2 3Node batch after Tactical Investing covered our project.

All of our Titan V2 3Nodes sold out!

Although our last batch sold out, we are taking new registrations for the next batch already.

Pre-register here
news.excerpt: After Tactical Investing covered our project, the Q2 Titan V2 3Node batch is offically sold out!

previous.title: 3Node Pre-Register Q2 Batch Closing Soon
previous.excerpt: Pre-register before the 30th of June if you want to be included in the batch.
